name: The Sylvania Mountain Range
text: When this card is activated: Choose 1 "Sylvan" card from your Deck and place it on top of the Deck. If a "Sylvan" monster you control is targeted by a card effect: you can send this face-up card to the GY; negate the activation, and if you do, you can add 1 "Friendly Forest Friends" from your Deck to your hand. During the Standby Phase: You can excavate the top card of your Deck, and if it is a Plant-Type monster, send it to the GY. Otherwise, place it on either the top or bottom of your Deck.
